channel.title: 317 Player runs to NPC
channel.description: Whenever a player is attacking an NPC, and then does a teleport command ie "::home", they will start to run through walls towards the direction the NPC was in. Can someone please help me with this. All it has to be is just taking some code out or modifying it? Correct?

item.title: 317 Player runs to NPC
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

If you have this method, add

walkTo(0,0);

Read full topic

@guthixmonk26 wrote:

Whenever a player is attacking an NPC, and then does a teleport command ie “::home”, they will start to run through walls towards the direction the NPC was in. Can someone please help me with this. All it has to be is just taking some code out or modifying it? Correct?
